title: Omega-3
description:
Omega-3 fatty acids help to reduce inflammation, which have been found to reverse the progression of some autoimmune diseases. These fatty acids can also improve symptoms, such as reducing pain.

Omega-3 can improve arthritis, irritable bowel disease (ulcerative colitis & Crohn's disease), lupus, multiple sclerosis, psoriasis, & more. They also promote brain, kidney, & cardiovascular health. (PubMed).
